local_intent: Ensure visibility or re-scan for the T_block, move to a safe overhead pose at 3 cm offset, then verify arrival at the target locus.
assumptions: IsAt(T_block) is used as a coarse verification that the overhead approach completed.
coherence_with_global: Mirrors the global perception fallback, executes MoveAbove with the same parameters, and adds a minimal post-check to confirm approach completion.
